title: OpenAI Warns EU Antitrust Watchdogs of Big Tech’s Data Dominance
description: OpenAI has raised concerns with European Union antitrust enforcers over potentially harmful conduct by the likes of Alphabet Inc.’s Google, Microsoft Corp. and Apple Inc.

title: Lyft Plans Fleet of Hundreds of Tensor Robocars From 2027
description: Lyft Inc. is partnering with autonomous vehicle developer Tensor Auto Inc. to deploy a fleet of hundreds of robotaxis in Europe and North America starting in 2027.

title: Meta’s $799 Display Glasses Give a Glimpse of the Future: Review
description: The social networking giant has found a new category that consumers will need to take seriously.
